title: Add support for debugging
description: Add support for the debugQuery and explainOther query parameters

comments.author: Jeff Rodenburg
comments.content:
Support added with new DebugResults object, which is added to a SearchResults instance.  Debug results are enabled by one of two approaches:

1) Setting IsDebugEnabled to true on a QueryBuilder instance
2) Setting the ExplainOtherQuery property on a QueryBuilder instance, which is a full-fledged Query object

Various properties and collections are available on the DebugResults object that is populated when either of these two settings are applied.
